title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign 

Driving Licences Held by Relevant Persons) (Ukraine) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic (recognition foreign driving licence held relevant persons) (ukraine) order 2022

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: In this Order ‘Regulations of 2006’ means the Road Traffic (Licensing
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order ‘Regulations of 2006’ means the Road Traffic (Licensing 

of Drivers) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006).
text_norm: 2 order regulation 2006 mean road traffic (licensing drivers) regulation 2006 (s.i no 537 2006)

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a relevant person to
text_raw:
3. 

It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a relevant person to 
drive a mechanically propelled vehicle, not being a licence or permit issued to 
a relevant person to enable that person to learn or provisionally to drive such a 
vehicle, issued by the competent authority of Ukraine in a category which 
corresponds to a category specified in the Table to Regulation 6 of the 2006 
Regulations is recognised for the purpose of use in the State in respect of the 
category. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 September, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [434] 3

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the recognition of Ukrainian driving licences held by 
persons with a permission to reside under section 60(6) of the International 
Protection Act 2015 for use in Ireland while that permission is valid. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [434]
